name: iphone 11 pro
description: Apple iPhone 11 Pro supports frequency bands GSM , CDMA , HSPA , EVDO , LTE. Official announcement date is September 2019. The device is working on an iOS 13 with a Hexa-core (2x2.65 GHz Lightning + 4x1.8 GHz Thunder) processor. Apple iPhone 11 Pro has 64GB 4GB RAM, 256GB 4GB RAM, 512GB 4GB RAM of built-in memory.
